pullrequest.title: Send message to subscribers only once per connection

content.raw: Sorry for the late reply. With the same change, you can also launch `gzserver` and, in another terminal, `gz model -m ground_plane -i`. Without the change, the message `Advertisement on /gazebo/default/request` will be printed four times instead of one.
content.html: Sorry for the late reply. With the same change, you can also launch gzserver and, in another terminal, gz model -m ground_plane -i. Without the change, the message Advertisement on /gazebo/default/request will be printed four times instead of one.
